'''Hawa''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[The Akademiya]], [[Sumeru City]], [[Sumeru]] at night, where she can be found talking to her older sister [[Iris (Sumeru City)|Iris]]. Hawa is a member of [[Rtawahist]], although Iris' daytime dialogue and their conversation at night indicates Hawa specializes in studying the runes of [[King Deshret]]'s civilization.
